thread.title: Apple iPhone 7 will dump the home button and boost battery life
thread.title_full: Apple iPhone 7 will dump the home button and boost battery life

title: Apple iPhone 7 will dump the home button and boost battery life
text:
Apple iPhone 7 'will dump the home button and boost battery life' 
Daily Mail Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
The iPhone 6s, shown here, could be the last to have a physical home button, an analyst has claimed. 'As many have speculated, the addition of 3D Touch may provide Apple with a way to eliminate the home button on the phone and use the additional space to make the screen bigger or make the device smaller,' he said, according to...
